- Automated value-based segmentation reports using AWS Lambda and Glue.

{"__is_pydantic": true, "value": {"input": [{"role": "user", "additional_kwargs": {}, "blocks": [{"block_type": "text", "text": "Tell me the names of all the candidates?"}]}, {"role": "assistant", "additional_kwargs": {"tool_calls": [{"index": 0, "id": "call_ezJzePsWNgOQbQz6aKMNSLre", "function": {"arguments": "{"input": "Kamya_Resume.pdf"}", "name": "summary_tool"}, "type": "function"}, {"index": 1, "id": "call_kjmPO3uGZcFn1WKMZnpBN9fs", "function": {"arguments": "{"input": "Mrittika_Das_resume.pdf"}", "name": "summary_tool"}, "type": "function"}, {"index": 2, "id": "call_MVsF19IBJErJoZRTSYySNhMi", "function": {"arguments": "{"input": "Oindrila_Chakravarty_Resume.pdf"}", "name": "summary_tool"}, "type": "function"}, {"index": 3, "id": "call_LcblCooR2MUUhwvpuvQlOF8v", "function": {"arguments": "{"input": "Rajarshi_Chatterjee_Resume.pdf"}", "name": "summary_tool"}, "type": "function"}, {"index": 4, "id": "call_qJk4FmtVY7nxEtVqtYcHfRJh", "function": {"arguments": "{"input": "Richa_Gupta_AWS_Eng_Resume.pdf"}", "name": "summary_tool"}, "type": "function"}]}, "blocks": [{"block_type": "text", "text": ""}]}, {"role": "tool", "additional_kwargs": {"tool_call_id": "call_LcblCooR2MUUhwvpuvQlOF8v"}, "blocks": [{"block_type": "text", "text": "Rajarshi Chatterjee is a professional with expertise in building generative AI applications and sustainable frameworks using Python and AWS. He specializes in developing intuitive interfaces for querying financial reports and is known for consistently delivering innovative solutions that enhance efficiency and drive business success. Rajarshi has strong problem-solving skills and excels in integrating and streamlining complex data systems."}]}, {"role": "tool", "additional_kwargs": {"tool_call_id": "call_kjmPO3uGZcFn1WKMZnpBN9fs"}, "blocks": [{"block_type": "text", "text": "Mrittika Das is a Software Engineer with over 2.6 years of experience, specializing in working with Ping Products. She has expertise in IAM modules like SSO, SAML, OAuth, and has worked on projects focusing on identity management, single sign-on, and security for enterprise applications.
